concept.title: Introducing Sametime Meetings
concept.shortdesc: The HCL Sametime Meetings application helps you start a meeting in just a few clicks!

conbody.p: Sametime Meetings provides you with a complete chat and meetings solution through an elegant and functional user experience. End-users can:

ul.li: Start instant meetings from the Sametime home page or chat window.
Invite others by sharing the Meeting URL via any medium.
Use voice, video, and screen sharing with a click of a button.
Experience fast performance through WebRTC technology.
